item.description:
Location will be given to members who RSVP. Very close to both C and D lines, and there is parking on street.

In a NEW and more spacious private location. Less kitchen so make the pre-ritual food snacky and easy to eat. EGGS a suggested theme for this season. Your own utensils are a good idea, as what Maiyim has now is very limited.

Please check your RSVP and change if necessary. We have room for a few more women.

We gather between 6:30 - 7:45 for eats, socializing and unwinding from the day and then create our ritual circle together. Shall we call it neo-pagan eclectic? Honoring elements of many traditions and always open to participants leading parts of the simple circle and healing ritual.

Bring goodies to share, items you want to charge on the altar we will lay together, candles, seeds are suggested for this time and we can bless them, maybe a pillow to sit upon. We may want to use writing in the ritual, so you might bring your journal or note book.

We will complete our circle by ten, and then linger to ground with tea and snacks as the Goddesses wish.
item.how_to_find_us: Location in Brookline,very close to both C and D lines, with on street parking, will be given to members who RSVP.
item.name: Welcome Spring Friday March 22, 2013
